forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy this evening with showers developing after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clearing skies after some evening rain. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming mostly clear late. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High around 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.
